welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Granja, Chile! This quaint city is known for its beautiful parks, vibrant markets, and friendly locals. Take some time to explore and soak in the charm of this wonderful place."

restaurants.name: Chong Ching
restaurants.description: Chong Ching is a chinese restaurant located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Av Santa Rosa 8651, Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Jimmy Sushi
restaurants.description: Jimmy Sushi is a sushi restaurant located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Fernández Albano (esq. Sn Francisco), Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Aiko Sushi
restaurants.description: Aiko Sushi is a sushi restaurant located in La Florida.
restaurants.address: Vicuña Mackenna Poniente 6482 (Barcelona), 8260032 La Florida, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Pasteleria El Parron
restaurants.description: Pasteleria El Parron is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: El Chilenazo
restaurants.description: El Chilenazo is a bbq joint located in La Florida.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights, providing modern amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
